item.description:
Hey guys,
Hooters plays ever WWE Pay-Per-View free of charge for customers. Since it's something I have to watch for work but don't get for free, I figured why not enjoy the view of a hot waitress during my company's second biggest event of the year... The Royal Rumble.

This is a bro-hood building mini-event. Attendence is NOT required but obviously encouraged to those in the area. Plus it gives some quality Hired-Gun targets to practice on.

Hooters in Milford - 8 PM, Sunday the 25th

RSVP Please by Sunday morning so I know how big a table to get.

JC
item.name: Small Social Gathering - Royal Rumble at Hooters, Milford
